meanings.definition: To make something rural or rustic in style or character.
meanings.sent1: I countryfy my room by adding wooden furniture and cozy decorations.
meanings.sent2: She decided to countryfy her garden by planting wildflowers and installing a wooden fence.
meanings.sent3: The city girl tried to countryfy her apartment by hanging up a fake barn door.
meanings.sent4: The artist countryfied the painting by adding a barn and rolling hills in the background.
meanings.sent5: The interior designer countryfied the house with a farmhouse sink and plaid curtains.

meanings.definition: To give a rural or rustic appearance to something.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant owner countryfies the menu by adding dishes made with locally sourced ingredients.
meanings.sent2: They decided to countryfy the barn by painting it red and adding a weather vane on top.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to countryfy the dish by serving it on a wooden platter.
meanings.sent4: The decorator countryfied the room by hanging up vintage farm tools as decorations.
meanings.sent5: The gardener countryfied the backyard by planting a vegetable patch and installing a wooden swing.
